subclassFeature.name: Arcane Ordnance
entries: A mighty wizard converted you, or an ancestor of yours, into a living arcane weapon. They wanted a loyal soldier who could eliminate their enemies with simple, yet devastating bolts of force. However, they severely underestimated their creation's power and desire for autonomy.

subclassFeature.name: Arsenal Spells
entries: The magic infused inside of you was built for neutralizing mages and warriors alike. You learn certain spells at the sorcerer levels noted in the table below. They count as sorcerer spells for you, but they don't count against your number of Spells Known.

entries.caption: Arsenal Spells
rows: {@spell dimension door}, {@spell otiluke's resilient sphere||resilient sphere}
{@spell bigby's hand||arcane hand}, {@spell wall of force}

subclassFeature.name: Mystic Artillery
entries: You are a wellspring of pure arcane power. You can cast {@spell magic missile} as a cantrip. When cast in this way, it only creates one dart. The number of darts increases when you reach certain sorcerer levels, increasing to two at 5th level, three at 11th level, and four at 17th level.

subclassFeature.name: Power Flux
entries: Your spells are highly adaptable. Whenever you finish a long rest, you can replace one {@filter Metamagic|optionalfeatures|Feature Type=MM} option you know with another Metamagic option of your choice.

You also gain a number of special sorcery points equal to your proficiency bonus. These sorcery points cannot be used with your Font of Magic feature or for Metamagic on a spell other than {@spell magic missile}. When you cast {@spell magic missile}, you can spend 1 sorcery point to modify it in one of the following ways of your choice:

entries.name: Seeking
entries: Each dart can target an unseen creature if you can still detect its location.

entries.name: Shattering
entries: Each dart can target and damage an object that isn't being worn or carried.

entries.name: Shifting
entries: You can change the damage type of each dart to another damage type of your choice.

entries.name: Shoving
entries: A creature hit by at least one dart must succeed on a Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 10 feet in a horizontal direction of your choice.

entries.name: Swarming
entries: You create two more darts instead of one more dart for each slot level above 1st used to cast it.

subclassFeature.name: Unstoppable Force
entries: The magic you possess defies physical boundaries. When you cast a sorcerer spell, you can choose to cast it at an eligible target behind total cover, and bypass any obstructions that would prevent a location from being included within the spell's area of effect (if any).

Once you use this feature, you can't use it again until you finish a long rest, unless you spend a number of sorcery points equal to the spell's level to use it again (1 sorcery point if the spell is a cantrip).

subclassFeature.name: Mana Barrage
entries: You unleash salvoes of overwhelming power. When you cast {@spell magic missile}, you can spend a number of sorcery points equal to the spell's level to cause each of its darts to deal maximum damage, and ignore any effects that would cause a creature to be unaffected by it, such as the {@creature Tarrasque||Tarrasque's} Reflective Carapace or the {@spell shield} spell.
